about_the_game:
🐾 ANIMAL PATTERN - DEMO VERSION 🐾

Step into a charming, family-friendly world of adorable animals in Animal Pattern! Perfect for kids and adults alike, this relaxing memory game lets you unwind while challenging your mind. Match pairs of beautifully illustrated animals and watch the world come to life!

🎨 STUNNING HAND-DRAWN ART

Enjoy two delightful stages featuring beautifully hand-drawn dogs and horses. Each animal has unique patterns and poses. Can you find all the matches and complete the stage?

🎮 PLAY YOUR WAY

  • Full controller support – Sit back and relax while playing from your couch.

  • Keyboard & mouse friendly – Simple, intuitive controls make gameplay easy for all ages.

  • Customizable backgrounds – Switch colors for a cozy nighttime experience.

⭐ WANT MORE?

Upgrade to the full game to unlock:
✅ More stages & animals – Discover a variety of creatures!
✅ Randomized mode – Add an extra challenge by shuffling the pairs.
✅ Time-trial mode – Race against the clock and test your memory speed!

Try the Animal Pattern Demo today and experience a world of fun, relaxation, and adorable animals! 🐶🐴✨

name: Animal Pattern Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Amd Ryzen 3 1200 or Intel Core i3 6100
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Vulkan 1.0 compatible hardware
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Amd Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel Core i5 6400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Vulkan 1.0 compatible hardware
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: 🐾 Relax and train your memory in this charming memory game demo! Match animal pairs across two hand-drawn stages, featuring unique animals and soothing gameplay, perfect for all ages.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
